page.title: 01GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content: This picturesque area is made up of rolling farmland with the River Tees running through the southern edge in a sweeping meander.The area is close to the large Cleveland industrial area served by Teesside Airport,whose runways cover approximately one sixth of the block.There are almost no amenities and people must go to other areas. There is a church in the midst of farmland,but the only residential area of Low Worsall,with its village green,lies on the south bank,with no bridging point to give access to the northern bank. There is an important pumping station at Low Worsall. The area is not in any way a cohesive community with the block lying in North Yorkshire,Cleveland and County Durham.
